Text:
This is a bad ass mixing app!!! 
Worked great on my MBP w/ OS 10.6.8.
Cheers!
Rizzo220 for me it crashes constantly. Crashes after a export or a publish. That is not right.

@ m0ww0w... 
I had v1.2.10 and dropped this version onto my old version. I've had zero problems with this.
State the OS you are using with it.

To export/publish you must have at least one track in the lower mix area (not in the preview window on the right). If you try to export without having a mix, the app will crash. This seems to be a SW-bug and is not related to the crack.
